main event: Five sober Guatemalans reported a ground visual sighting of a UFO near La Aurora Airport on June 6, 1957.
interesting points: The UFO was described as grapefruit-sized and retained a bright orange and white color even through thin clouds,The object traveled slowly overhead at 9,000 feet in a straight line making frequent definite stops,The UFO then reversed its course by making a level turn to the west before making an abrupt climb,The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes with no trail or sound observed,Insufficient data for evaluation was concluded.
